compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/jia/Jamal's Stuff/my_projects/pro.serviceRawFile:
service: hirejamal-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    CLICKS_TABLE: clicktracker # Matches your DynamoDB table name
    FRONTEND_URL: https://www.hirejamal.com/ 
    NODE_ENV: production
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:PutItem
          Resource: "arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:provider.environment.CLICKS_TABLE}"

functions:
  app:
    handler: backend/server.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /analytics/clicks
          method: post
          cors:
            origin: "'https://www.hirejamal.com,https://hirejamal.com'"
            headers:
              - Content-Type
              - Origin
            allowCredentials: true
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors:
            origin: "'https://www.hirejamal.com,https://hirejamal.com'"
            headers:
              - Content-Type
              - Origin
            allowCredentials: true

package:
  include:
    - backend/**
  exclude:
    - .gitignore
    - dist/**
    - frontend/**
    - node_modules/.cache/**
    - node_modules/**/test/**
    - .git
    - .dockerignore
